mapper.insert: insert into dish(name, category_id, price, image, description, status, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{name},#{categoryId},#{price},#{image},#{description},#{status},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser})
mapper.select:
select dish.*,category.name as categoryName from dish left outer join category on dish.id = category_id
dish.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and dish.category_id like concat('%',#{categoryId},'%')
and dish.status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
order by dish.create_time desc
